channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- private_address_check ruby gem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- private_address_check ruby gem

item.title: CVE-2018-3759|2024-08-05T04:50:30.727Z -- hackerone -- private_address_check%20ruby%20gem
item.description: private_address_check ruby gem before 0.5.0 is vulnerable to a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition due to the address the socket uses not being checked. DNS entries with a TTL of 0 can trigger this case where the initial resolution is a public address but the subsequent resolution is a private address.
